siteTagline: Your all-in-one toolbox for online utilities.
siteDescription: OET provides a comprehensive suite of free, client-side tools for various data manipulation and generation tasks.  It's perfect for developers, data analysts, and anyone needing quick, privacy-focused online utilities.
siteBenefits: Access a wide variety of utilities in one place
Transform data quickly using client-side processing
Track your past operations with the History feature
Contribute new tools easily via the AI-assisted build process
Enjoy a consistent experience with Shoelace components
Works offline for many tools due to PWA setup
